Spotify

Principal Product Designer

New York, NY from 2/21/2021

You’ll lead multiple projects across the entire product lifecycle. You’ll set the vision for the user experience and create the space for others to collaborate.
Employ your strength in storytelling to present your vision and design rationale in a compelling, convincing manner to the wider team.
You'll work with multi-disciplinary teams on strategic, epic-level, cross-company initiatives that intersect multiple teams and business units. You’ll proactively partner with designers, researchers, product managers and engineers to arrive at elegant, practical and forward-thinking solutions to big design challenges.
You’ll take your seat at the cross-functional leadership table to inform the vision and strategy of the work that we do.
Consider the two-sided nature of the problem space. You’ll play in audio-forward, multimodal spaces, introducing new ways for listeners to engage with ads and promoted content. You’ll explore how these experiences span different user types, situations and devices. You’ll work to define the systems and tooling that power these experiences.
You’ll apply big-picture thinking to break down open-ended opportunities into actionable next steps. You will realize these ideas with the appropriate level of detail and fidelity at every phase, while tailoring those outputs for a variety of stakeholders.
You’ll operate autonomously, defining and providing the business unit with systems to best execute against current and future strategy. You’ll drive progress through obstacles by balancing collaboration, alignment and decisiveness - taking responsibility for every last detail, every step of the way.
You can flexibly operate across different types of engagements. You love to think big, but you know when it makes sense to go deep. You can help lay the groundwork to set new problem spaces up for success, and you can provide exceptional hands-on execution as necessary.
You’ll help us push the envelope and keep the best interests of all of our users (listeners, artists, marketers and advertisers) at heart. The ad-tech domain is fast-paced, prone to dark UX patterns (which we want to avoid), and not necessarily intuitive. We are hoping to challenge those antiquated values, and an existing understanding and ability to evangelize is valuable for the role.

Senior Product Designer - Data Foundations Platform

Stockholm, Sweden from 2/21/2021

Lead design projects for the Data, Machine Learning, and Insights platforms, focusing on providing a cohesive user experience
Understand user and business needs and how to prioritize design work based on insights gained from qualitative and quantitative research
Identify what is needed for each design phase
Partner with Product Managers and Engineers to generate ideas and viable solutions
Help identify and prioritize impactful features through research and workshops
Partner with Product Managers and Engineers to develop viable concepts
Work directly with the engineering teams to implement new features and iterations and ensure quality standards are met
Partner with teams across Spotify to contribute to our broader tool suite
Contribute to creating and maintaining our design system, participate in team critiques and reviews, assist in user research, organize customer events and design workshops

Design Program Manager - Experience Mission

Stockholm, Sweden from 2/21/2021

Work with the Director of Design and the existing Design Program Manager to establish key processes that are intended to integrate the Design team and keep them running efficiently and effectively.
Track multiple design initiatives in an organized and transparent fashion.
Continuously evolve design processes and tools to adapt to changing needs of the team.
Streamline communications for the design team to ensure information and knowledge is flowing freely. Coordinate and help facilitate the design team’s rituals to operationalize their work.
Ensure the teams are on track, facilitate decision-making, resolve blockers and surface challenges.
Improve how the design team interfaces with other functions such as Product Management, Engineering and Insights.
Organize workshops and design sprints for the team.
Own the operational side of design management such as contractor/agency management and budget management among others.
Effectively deliver operational improvements based on feedback from existing and future survey data.
Find new ways to research and uncover the needs of the Experience design team and share these with your design ops peers.
Track and communicate progress to the Director of Design and Global Head of Design Ops.
You will collaborate with the global design operations teams on various global design team programs where needed and participate in weekly design ops rituals to link the work you do to contribute to the work of the wider design ops strategy.

Senior UX Writer - Ad Platform, Concerts and Ticketing

New York, NY from 2/21/2021

Work with designers, researchers, product managers and engineers to deliver compelling content solutions. You’ll lead projects across the entire product lifecycle and multiple product launches. Together with your cross-functional partners, you’ll set the vision for the user experience and create the space for others to collaborate. Success will require fostering a shared understanding of the problem space using your skills to bring people together.
Pioneer the role of UX Writing in deeply technical spaces, bringing the concerns of our listeners with you, and taking on deep questions, for example “how do content strategy and machine learning systems intersect to create amazing listener and brand outcomes?”
Apply big-picture thinking to break down open-ended opportunities into meaningful next steps and find new opportunities for work that span across our organizational boundaries. You’ll connect with other UX Writers across the organization to build shared viewpoints and cohesive strategies.
Develop standards and frameworks for promotion at Spotify — listening and curating, or leading and defining, as needed. You’ll influence the development of the UX Writing function in our Ad business and in Spotify as a whole. You’ll help promote an understanding for your craft and the value it brings to the product development process.
Act autonomously and take ownership. You’ll provide teams with the methods, process and solutions needed to execute strategy. You’ll drive progress through obstacles by building consensus and making decisions - taking ownership for every last detail, every step of the way.

View Full Job Description →



UX Writer - Advertising Experience, Podcasts

New York, NY from 2/21/2021

Partner with designers, researchers, product managers, other UX writers and engineers to deliver compelling content solutions. Lead projects across the entire product lifecycle and multiple product launches. Together with these cross-functional partners, set the vision for the user experience and build the space for others to collaborate. Success will require encouraging a shared understanding of the problem space using your skills to bring people together.
Work across consumer-facing multimodal surfaces and more technical spaces, bringing the needs of our listeners with you as you explore.
Apply big-picture thinking to break down open-ended opportunities into meaningful next steps. Find new opportunities to build patterns and approaches across org boundaries. Connect with other UX Writers across the company to build shared viewpoints and cohesive strategies.
Develop standards and frameworks for ads and promotions at Spotify — listening and curating, or leading and defining, as needed.
Influence the development of your function within our Ad business and across Spotify as a whole. Promote understanding and demonstrate the value it brings to the product development process.
Be autonomous and take ownership. Provide teams with the methods, process and solutions needed to execute strategy. Drive progress through obstacles by building consensus and making decisions - taking ownership for every last detail, every step of the way.

Senior UX Writer - Ad Studio

New York, NY from 2/21/2021

Write clear, consistent, concise user-interface content, emails, notifications, and product tours at all stages of the advertiser journey.
Evolve our holistic content strategy for our advertising product experience.
Champion a cohesive brand story for our advertiser experiences and tools.
Collaborate with designers, researchers, prototypers, product managers, and engineers to deliver compelling UX solutions.
Act as a subject matter authority who can present and rationalize work to partners.
Use data and research to evaluate content’s impact.
Maintain and document evolving content, brand, and voice/tone standards.
Effectively balance multiple projects and deadlines.
Help lead projects alongside your design and cross-functional partners, across the entire user journey and ongoing product lifecycle.
Consider problems from multiple angles. You’ll produce an array of divergent approaches informed by a confluence of user needs, business objectives and technical capabilities.
Be autonomous. You’ll help promote an understanding for your discipline and the value it brings to the product development process. You’ll provide teams with the methods, process and solutions needed to execute strategy. You’ll drive progress through obstacles by building alignment and making decisions - taking responsibility for every last detail, every step of the way.

Senior Product Designer - Car Consumer Experience

Stockholm, Sweden from 2/21/2021

Be responsible for deepening relationships between artists and fans by extending Spotify into the car via an embedded experience.
Work with small multi-disciplinary teams made up of representatives from engineering, product, product insights, and marketing, among others.
Set the tone for our partnerships (Google, Amazon, GM, etc.) and advocate for quality when it comes to the Spotify experience as it is represented on external platforms.
Take into account existing insights, technical constraints, business needs, driver distraction guidelines and specific platform demands to produce data-informed solutions.
Collaborate with our international partners and be flexible with your working hours.
You’ll take full ownership of your work and total responsibility for every last detail, every step of the way, from whiteboard sketching to high-fidelity final treatments.
Rapidly produce multiple concepts and prototypes, understanding when deeper exploration is warranted and when it is best to change paths and try another approach.

Associate Principal Designer - Backstage

Stockholm, Sweden from 2/21/2021

Lead design projects across the entire product lifecycle and multiple product launches. You'll set the vision for the user experience and create the space for others to collaborate within Spotify and with the open-source community.
You work well with loosely defined problems and come up with relevant answers and meaningful insights.
You are comfortable with planning, prioritizing, conducting, analyzing, and communicating research, and turning the output into data that can drive informed product design decisions.
Partner closely with engineering, product, and business folks to find sophisticated but practical solutions to design challenges. Providing the thought leadership to develop the right product strategy
Take full ownership of your work, and you take responsibility for every last detail
Rapidly produce multiple concepts and prototypes; knowing when to apply pixel-perfect attention to detail, and when to make low-Fi sketches and prototypes

Product Designer - Advertising Experiences, Podcasts

New York, NY from 2/21/2021

Create compelling multimodal experiences across the Spotify ecosystem for ads and promotions, exploring new ways for our listeners to engage that span different personas, contexts and devices.
Work with peers to run experiments and develop processes in a fast-paced environment to change behaviors and drive revenue growth.
Collaborate with other podcast-focused teams and messaging teams to ensure we are using harmonious solutions and consistent patterns that spark engagement, while broadening the understanding of our consumers and their listening habits.
Think outside of the box to build and execute on broad ideas, turning them into exciting, innovative, and viable solutions for the business that drive revenue.
Work cross-functionally to drive a project forward by planning and breaking down open-ended opportunities into impactful next steps.
Use insights to inform your designs to balance listener value and performance. You have a solid understanding of experimentation frameworks.
Produce an array of divergent, human-focused approaches advised by user needs, business objectives and technical capabilities.

Work with your peers to run messaging experiments and develop processes in a fast-paced environment to change behaviors and drive growth.
Collaborate with our ads team to ensure we are using harmonious solutions and consistent patterns that spark engagement, while broadening the understanding of our consumers and their listening habits.
Think outside of the box to build and execute on broad ideas, turning them into exciting, innovative, and viable solutions for the business that drive revenue.
Work cross-functionally to drive a project forward by planning and breaking down open-ended opportunities into impactful next steps.
Use insights to advise your designs and prove the value of messaging. You have a solid understanding of experimentation frameworks.
Produce an array of divergent, human-focused approaches advised by user needs, business objectives and technical capabilities.

Design Manager - Platform Teams

Stockholm, Sweden from 2/21/2021

Co-lead a team of designers working on different complex problems and B2B software.
Guide the design team through their day to day work while also keeping an eye on the bigger picture and driving the overall vision.
Provide context, support and guidance as the team works toward our business objectives — you will inspire, not merely direct.
Identify and grow talent within the design team, setting them up for success through mentorship and coaching.
Collaborate closely with product, insights and tech counterparts to shape a vision for the platform.
Creatively integrate and build on top of Backstage.
You are willing to get hands-on, partnering closely with other designers and/or engineering teams.

Senior Product Designer, Marketplace Core

New York, NY from 2/21/2021

Partner closely with product managers and engineers to better understand opportunities and gaps within our internally-facing teams and turn insights into meaningful results.
Be the voice of both our internal and external customers, working alongside our engineers and product managers during systems development.
Solve complicated technical problems and find tooling solutions for our multi-disciplinary teams, so that our squads have the liberty to adapt quickly and innovate.
Collaborate with internal partners throughout both business and R&D, while considering requirements, constraints, user needs, and business goals.
Craft sophisticated but practical solutions to design challenges by partnering closely with engineering, product, and business folks.
Partner with other designers to build and align on a coherent user experience, while also considering business and technical requirements for various product offerings.
Develop sketches, wireframes, and prototypes to validate concepts and hypotheses with our end users.
Build, disseminate, and maintain systems documentation.
Be autonomous and take full ownership of your work on every last detail, every step of the way.

Design Manager, Spotify For Artists

New York, NY from 2/21/2021

Lead and shape the future of our Fan Commerce product area and Spotify for Artists offerings along with your counterparts in Product, Tech, and Product Insights.
Lead, manage, and grow a diverse and inclusive team of product designers and UX writers (3 direct reports to start), setting focus, strategy, and priorities to help individuals grow in their careers and maximize influence and impact.
Establish a set of customer-centric best practices for our design team to help them make informed decisions while delivering against our roadmap and business goals.
Drive high-level platform initiatives forward from a design perspective, collaborating closely with leads across our team and the wider Spotify organization.
Lead your team in design discovery and experimentation to uncover the biggest and best opportunities for us to research, prototype, and test.
Set the holistic design vision and actively guide your team through all phases of design development for key projects, from ideation to engineering execution and post-launch success tracking and iteration.

Senior Product Designer - Client Platform

Stockholm, Sweden from 2/21/2021

Work with multi-disciplinary teams made up of engineers, product managers, data scientists, and more.
Together with your cross-functional partners, you’ll set the vision for the user experience and create the space for others to collaborate. You’ll help foster a shared understanding of the problem space by facilitating cross-functional workshops and group ideation sessions.
You have a people-focused design mentality; you are constantly looking to hone your design instinct through user feedback. Whether through hands-on user research, or by designing options for an A/B test.
Be autonomous. You’ll drive progress through obstacles by building consensus and making decisions – taking responsibility for every last detail, every step of the way.
Take into account existing insights, technical constraints, business needs, and specific platform demands to produce data-informed solutions that consider problems from multiple angles.
Evolve the design practices in the tribe by evangelizing, coaching and mentoring others. You’ll provide teams with the methods, processes, and solutions needed to execute strategy.
